meta.title: Meganom Polygraph
meta.keywords: printing, paper bags, cardboard bags, logo bags, gift bags, kraft bags, embossed bags, foil stamped bags, designer bags, UV lacquered bags, branded folders, custom bags, business packaging, eco-friendly packaging, promotional bags, branded bags
meta.home-page-description: Meganom Polygraph is a manufacturer of high-quality paper and cardboard bags in both large and small quantities. Logo bags, gift bags, kraft bags, embossed and foil stamped bags, designer bags, and other services for your business. We offer custom products at competitive prices with high quality.
meta.about-page-description: Manufacturing and custom bag production in Kyiv. Individual approach, fast order fulfillment times - Meganom Polygraph.
meta.example-page-description: Meganom Polygraph printing house - examples of work. Full cycle of services: design preparation and production.
meta.example-paper-bags-laminated-page-descri: Coated paper bags with a density of 150 g/m², 170 g/m², 200 g/m², 250 g/m², covered with glossy or matte film (matte or glossy lamination). Offset printing. Bottom and handles reinforced with 400 g/m² cardboard. Handles: polypropylene or polyester cord with filling, 5 mm diameter.
meta.example-logo-bags-page-description: This packaging is perfect for advertising. Logos or any image can be printed on the bags. Branded paper bags help boost company image, enhance brand recognition, and show that the company cares about its clients.
meta.example-cardboard-bags-page-description: We recommend this type of bag for heavy products. Cardboard packaging is strong and allows you to carry items like outerwear, bottles, etc., with confidence that it can support the weight. The print quality on cellulose-coated cardboard is also high.
meta.example-kraft-bags-page-description: Branded kraft bags speak to the awareness of the company’s leadership, distinguish you from competitors, and communicate the values of your brand. Kraft paper bags are eco-friendly, with paper density of 80 g/m², 100 g/m², 110 g/m², 120 g/m², 170 g/m², in brown or white color, with twisted handles or 0.5 mm cord.
meta.example-gift-bags-page-description: This is the business card of your gift. A bright or subdued design will create a charming atmosphere. We have a wide selection of sizes and layouts for any gift and any celebration or meeting. All available products can be found out from our managers.
meta.example-branded-folders-page-description: Necessary for exchanging documents with clients, participating in seminars and conferences. A branded folder can be used as a promotional item, featuring the company’s QR code, information about services, or special offers. A branded folder is an important element of a company’s style.
meta.example-designer-paper-bags-page-descrip: Significantly different from standard types of packaging. They are strong and attract attention, created to emphasize your company’s individuality. When choosing designer paper for the bags, pay attention to color, texture, and density. Minimum order is 50 pieces.
meta.example-uv-lacquer-bags-page-description: Stylish and creative, attracting attention and leaving a lasting impression. UV lacquer is applied to the matte surface, which hardens and acquires a glossy finish when exposed to UV light. Selective UV lacquer is applied to design elements that need to be highlighted or emphasized. Selective UV lacquer stands out especially on dark matte surfaces.
meta.example-page-embossed-bags-description: Add luxury and elegance to your products. Despite their affordability, they have an expensive look with an impressive design. Foil embossing of a logo or text on the bag’s surface is done using special foil and heated matrices. Congreve is the process of creating a raised image on the material’s surface (paper or cardboard) using a stamp and counter-stamp. Minimum order is 100 pieces.
meta.contacts-page-description: Contact details of the printing house for bag production: phone numbers, email, address, and messengers.

home.home-page-description: Meganom Polygraph is a manufacturer of high-quality paper and cardboard bags in large and small print runs. Bags with logos, gift bags, kraft bags, embossed and debossed bags, designer bags, and other services for your business. We offer custom-made products at competitive prices with high quality.
home.home-hero-services: Laminated paper bags ⋅ Logo bags ⋅ Kraft bags ⋅ Gift bags ⋅ Embossed and debossed bags ⋅ Designer paper bags ⋅ Spot UV lacquer bags ⋅ Branded document folders
home.home-services-paper-bags-laminated-descr: Custom laminated bags made of coated paper with rope handles
home.home-services-logo-bags-description: We print your logo or any image on advertising bags
home.home-services-cardboard-bags-description: Custom cardboard bags are durable and have an elegant look
home.home-services-kraft-bags-description: Kraft bags are an eco-friendly packaging solution at a budget-friendly price
home.home-services-gift-bags-description: We are Ukrainian manufacturers of gift bags for all occasions
home.home-services-branded-folders-descriptio: Branded folders with embossing or printing are an essential element of a company's style
home.home-services-designer-paper-bags-descri: Designer paper or cardboard bags are made using die-cutting
home.home-services-uv-lacquer-bags-descriptio: A bag with UV lacquer will effectively highlight your company’s logo
home.home-services-embossed-bags-description: Embossing and debossing on bags add a unique appearance
home.home-contact-form-contact-error: Please provide at least one contact
home.home-contact-form-message-placeholder: Specify the bag size, material, printing, and quantity
home.home-contact-form-error: Sorry... it looks like an error occurred
home.home-contact-form-sending-error: An error occurred while sending the message

about.about-page-description: Manufacturing and production of bags in Kyiv on order. Individual approach, fast order execution - Meganom Polygraph.
about.about-paragraph-first: Since our founding in 2000, we have chosen a development vector that we successfully adhere to: the paper and cardboard bags we produce must be of the highest possible quality. We do not manufacture bags at the lowest prices – we create high-quality products at competitive prices.
about.about-paragraph-second: With our own production facilities equipped with modern machinery and quality control at every stage of production, as well as well-established and reliable connections with both Ukrainian and international suppliers, we can guarantee our clients favorable cooperation terms and long-term partnerships.
about.about-paragraph-third: Meganom Polygraph offers you a wide range of high-quality paper and cardboard bags that are perfect for various purposes, whether it be product packaging, promotional materials, or corporate gifts. Our products are distinguished not only by their high quality but also by stylish designs that attract attention and enhance your brand.
about.about-paragraph-fourth: The main difference between our company and competitors is that, as of today, the products we offer have the best price-to-quality ratio on the Ukrainian market. Many customers and regular clients have already appreciated this and our other advantages.

delivery.delivery-kyiv-paragraph-first: Product delivery is discussed individually with the manager.
delivery.delivery-kyiv-paragraph-second: Product shipment time is from 10:00 AM to 5:00 PM on business days.
delivery.delivery-ukraine-paragraph-first: Delivery of products to other cities and regions of Ukraine is carried out by the 'Nova Poshta' courier service. The delivery cost is calculated individually according to the carrier’s tariffs, depending on the weight, dimensions of the shipment, and destination region. The delivery payment is made by the customer upon receipt of the goods.
delivery.delivery-ukraine-paragraph-second: Please review the delivery conditions on the carrier’s website: "Nova Poshta"

example.example-description: Explore examples of our products created in various styles and technologies. We offer high-quality packaging and branded products to choose from: Laminated Paper Bags, Branded Logo Bags, Cardboard Bags, Kraft Bags, Gift Bags, Branded Folders, Designer Paper Bags, UV Lacquer Bags, Embossed Bags

contacts.contacts-page-description: Contacts of the printing house for bag production: phone numbers, email, address, and messengers.
